problem.markdown:
>>Which of the following are exemplifies the Kanban system?<<
[ ] Central planning [ ] Optimize scheduling [ ] Zero inventory [x] Production control systems [x] Information systems [ ] Push system [x] Pull system
[explanation] The Kanban system uses a signaling system that enables and disables production at individual processes. The tradtional Kanban card also includes information such as inventory, lot size and others. [explanation]
